block.createlowheated.charcoal_burner.to: Provides _heat_ to _Basin Recipes_ and the _Steam Engine_.
Right click it with _Charcoal_ or use a _Deployer/Mechanical Arm_.
To start the _fire_ you need to right-click it with _Flint and Steel_. As long as it's fed charcoal continually, the fire will persist.
